187.title: The Buddy Project
187.description: The Royal Academy has lost its glory thanks to its rebellious students. Former star student Jaitely comes in, to guide these bright, yet reckless students.

390.title: Miley Jab Hum Tum
390.description: With dreams in their eyes, small-town sisters, Gunjan and Nupur arrive at Excel College only to witness friendships, heartbreaks and meet their soulmates.

639.title: Jhalli Anjali
639.description: A coming-of-age story of Anjali, whose world revolves around Angad. When he breaks her heart, watch her set out to discover a new self.

644.title: O Gujariya
644.description: Vaibhavi Singh, a spirited teenager, aims to become an IAS officer to uncover the unjust offences made against her father. Can she get justice for him?

1656.title: Dil Dostii Dance
1656.description: A dance-based show that traces the journey of a college students and their passion for dance, as they wade through emotions around love and friendship.

1662.title: PS I hate you
1662.description: Two sisters, Simple and Dimple, can live neither with nor without each other. Watch them grow up in this fun-filled story of friendship and unique aspirations.

2245.title: Million Dollar Girl
2245.description: Avantika’s dreams go way beyond the town of Banaras. Follow her journey as she chases a life of luxury that she has always dreamt of.

5534.title: Secret Diaries
5534.description: Sometimes, some stories are best left unspoken and hidden. Secret Diaries open up things that teens refrain from sharing.

7123.title: Mastaangi
7123.description: Udita and Kabir's fairy-tale love ends tragically with their untimely deaths. Blessed with a new life, they get to unravel their past and rekindle their love.

14791.title: Suvreen Guggal
14791.description: Suvreen, a small-town girl, comes to Delhi to make a big splash in the world of fashion. With new challenges, will Suvreen carve a new identity for herself?

1260015278.title: Hannah Montana
1260015278.description: Miley Stewart lives a double life as a famous pop singer named Hannah Montana and constantly tries to conceal her true identity from the public.

1260018178.title: High School Musical 2
1260018178.description: The East High Wildcats take centre stage at the Lava Springs Country Club, where Sharpay tries to lure Troy away from Gabriella and his friends.

1260018300.title: High School Musical
1260018300.description: Troy and Gabriella share a passion for singing. When these two polar opposites try out for the school musical, it disturbs on East High's rigid social order.

1260018301.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
1260018301.description: Troy and Gabriella joined by the rest of the Wildcats, stage an elaborate spring musical reflecting their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

1260027571.title: Sky High
1260027571.description: William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

1260061363.title: Gumrah
1260061363.description: Based on real-life incidents, watch how young and vulnerable people are often led astray by harsh circumstances.

1260061366.title: Kota Toppers
1260061366.description: Set against the backdrop of the high-pressure world of competitive engineering exams, follow the misadventures of six frenemies!

1260066788.title: Best of Luck Nikki
1260066788.description: Dolly creates a video diary about their family and friends containing advice for Nikki when she grows up.

1260097087.title: Kana Kaanum Kaalangal
1260097087.description: A conventional school reopens after a long break, only to face various problems within the premises. Now, the students must join hands to save their school.

1260101744.title: Kya Mast Hai Life
1260101744.description: Follow the comical daily lives of five college friends who have fun and enjoy their journey of life at Redfield Academy.
